overview: Faceless God dreams up a Man. Within the screening of that Idea arise seven gifts that he bestows to his dream. The gifts to tear the image of a Man apart from the image of a God. As those gifts and how he accepts them make him like God, or rather like Animals they are symbolized by. Man, born similar, given the seven gifts of seven deadly sins wakes up to the World now... In his own likeness.
title: Upon His Image
